item.title: Monolith and pain

item.title: VFX - Checking through white house records- Designated survivor
item.description:
Emily Rhodes, Secretary Tom Kirkman’s chief of staff tries to find out who made a call out of the white house.

item.title: Power of going deep -Excerpt
item.description: Excerpts from DEEP WORK by Cal Newport - “Deep Work: Professional activities performed in a state of distraction-free concentration that push your cognitive capabilities to their limit. These efforts create new value, improve your skill, and are hard to replicate.” “Shallow Work: Noncognitively demanding, logistical-style tasks, often performed while distracted. These efforts tend to not create much new...
